text: Year 11 BC was either a common year starting on Monday or Tuesday or a leap year starting on Sunday, Monday or Tuesday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Tubero and Maximus. == Events == * Battle of the Lupia River is a Roman victory * Roman fortresses are built near Bonn, Dorsten, Haltern, and Oberaden == Deaths == * Octavia Minor, sister of Caesar Augustus (b. 69 BC)
title: 11 BC
